channel.title: Tutorials on Felipe Valdez Gómez de la Torre
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on Felipe Valdez Gómez de la Torre

item.title: Mapping Census Data in R
item.description: This tutorial, 'Mapping Census Data in R,' teaches participants how to access, analyze, and visualize US Census data using R programming.

item.title: Storytelling with Maps - Using Maplibre
item.description: 'Storytelling with MapLibre' tutorial teaches participants how to create interactive map-based stories without coding experience.

item.title: KoboToolbox Tutorial
item.description: This is a comprehensive tutorial on KoboToolbox, an open-source platform for data collection, management, and visualization widely used by nonprofit organizations.

item.title: Using Open Geospatial Data in GIS
item.description: This tutorial provides a comprehensive guide to accessing, exploring, and downloading open geospatial data from OpenStreetMap (OSM) and Overture Maps for use in Geographic Information Systems, specifically QGIS.

item.title: Ultra (Overpass Ultra) Tutorial
item.description: Ultra is a web application that helps you create custom interactive maps using OpenStreetMap data.
